OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD - FREEDOM TO ROAM

Desc.entry: A chargeable service, aimed at people aged 50 years and over who have mild to moderate dementia, offering an opportunity to learn new skills and find support and friendship from others on a rolling programme of 6 walks. The needs of the individual will be taken into account via support planning and is available to all including those receiving direct payments. The walks will have a theme and be an opportunity to reminisce in and friendly and fun environment. Customers would need to make their own way to the starting point but would be supported by a support worker during the walk. Relatives/friends/carers of the customer with the dementia diagnosis are welcome to accompany them on the walk and will not have to pay for the session. The six walks will each last 2 hours and will be run once a fortnight. A registered charity and company limited by guarantee 5207254
